text: Ando Island is an island in Borongan, Eastern Samar. == Places == Ando Island has many resorts. It has a Port so that visitors can visit the island. The first hanging hammock in Eastern Samar is at the Island, it has a hammock, hanging above the Pacific Ocean. == History == On November 12, 2013, Typhoon Haiyan hit the Philippines; in Ando Island a ship resting in the island fell on it's side because of the typhoon, killing 2 people and making 5 missing. On September 5, 2023, the government of Borongan said that they will have a national kayaking event, being hosted by the city, Ando Island was one of the starting places for the kayaking event. == References == Category:Islands of Eastern Samar
title: Ando Island
